full_threads.body: (Time: 60mins)

Hi Ben,

Hope you’re doing well!

Just confirming that the live sites for both the Mel and Syd properties now reflect the updated pricing and text changes.
  • The new pricing will apply to any proposals created from July 22, 2025 onward.

Let me know if you need anything else—happy to help!

Hi Ben,

Thanks for confirming,

We will update the site after working hrs for both Syd and Melbourne.

Hi Joel,

Please go ahead and make this live.

Thanks

Regards,

Ben Rookes

Operations MANAGER



0456 553 848



03 9580 4102



brookes@novaricollective.com



Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195



NOVARICOLLECTIVE.COM.AU

Hi Ben,

I hope you are doing well.

Let me know if we can push this to the live site.

Thanks Joel.

The Melbourne link looks good to me.

Regards,

Andrea Albiez

NOVARI COLLECTIVE

+61 411 114 778

The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party without the sender's written consent. If you received this by mistake, please reply and delete it to avoid recurrence.

Hi Andrea,

Yes, here is an example: I have updated the test proposal in staging to 6weeks paid and 4 weeks free.

Thanks for the update, and all the best for what’s next after Novari Collective! :)
We’ve really appreciated working with you. Noted on the handover, We’ll liaise with Ben and Greta going forward.

Hi Joel,

This all looks good now, thank you. The only question I have is if we change the rental period. Sometimes we offer 4 weeks paid and 4 weeks free / eight-week period. If we do that, do the words 'six-week' period update to 'eight'?



Today is my last day at Novari Collective. Thanks so much for your support and prompt responses! Ben Rookes and Greta.Smith@johnslyng.com.au will liaise with you on this in the future.

Kind regards,

Andrea Albiez

NOVARI COLLECTIVE

+61 411 114 778

Hi Andrea,

Just a quick update, we’ve made the changes on the staging site related to the price increase, room total tally, and anything tied to those. We’ve fully removed that functionality as discussed.
Feel free to take a look and let me know if everything looks good on your end!
Sydney - https://stg-proposaladvantage-syd.kinsta.cloud/secure/?prop=ZndXQk80blk1NFNZcmdFVHB4aEwzUT09&address=8-imlay-place-barden-ridge
Melbourne - https://stg-dressedforsale-mel.kinsta.cloud/secure/?prop=bXlWdGVYbkEzSFREdk5nT3pGZXl5Zz09&address=11-bellevue-avenue-malvern-east
(Time: 30mins)

Hi Andrea,

I hope you are all well.

Just an update we are still working on the updates in staging for both syd and mel.

Please see the updated the Inventories.

Hi Andrea,

Sure, all good if its support@.

Sorry Joel - need to change to 2.30pm. Is there a better email I should use or are you happy for the invite to go to support@?

Andrea Albiez
